name: Portal Run (LelulaGames)
description:
You have ten seconds. Get to the portal! Run!

W,A,S,D - space to jump.  R to reset.

Note- Made in 5 hours, because I didn't know LD was happening until yesterday. Learned how to do a bunch of new things, but could not link the death screen with the timer in time. It is a major bug, and I will have to fix it after LD voting is over.

Thank you for playing.
